meanings.definition: Express one's opinions in a pompous or dogmatic way.
meanings.sent1: He pontificates about politics at every family gathering.
meanings.sent2: She pontificates on social media about the importance of healthy eating.
meanings.sent3: The cat pontificates about the best sleeping spots in the house.
meanings.sent4: The old tree pontificates on the secrets of the forest to the young saplings.
meanings.sent5: The wise owl pontificates on the mysteries of the night to the curious animals.

meanings.definition: Serve as a bishop, especially in a pontifical capacity.
meanings.sent1: The bishop pontificates during the grand ceremony.
meanings.sent2: He pontificates in the cathedral on important religious matters.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel pontificates as the bishop of the forest creatures.
meanings.sent4: The river pontificates as the life force of the valley.
meanings.sent5: The sun pontificates over the sky, bringing light to all.
